string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: The fruit is round or oval with a skin that is usually red, green, or yellow in color. The flesh is crisp and sweet.
The fruit is round or oval in shape with a dark green skin. The pulp is soft and contains plenty of healthy fats.
Elongated fruit with bright yellow skin when ripe. The flesh is soft and sweet.
The small berries are dark blue in color. The flesh is soft and sweet.
The berries are small with a bright red or yellow color. The pulp is sweet and juicy.
A dish made from a mixture of different types of fruit cut into slices. Usually served with sauce or dressing.
Large fruit with yellow or green skin. The flesh is orange-yellow, soft, and very sweet.
Round fruit with orange-colored skin. The pulp is segmented and juicy.
The large fruits are round or oval in shape with green or yellow skin. The pulp is orange in color and soft.
The fruit is tubular with a spiny skin. The flesh is bright yellow and has a sweet and slightly sour flavor.
The fruit is round with dark green skin and thorns. The flesh is white, soft, and has a unique flavor, sweet and slightly sour.
The small berries are heart-shaped and bright red in color. The flesh is soft and sweet.
The large fruits are round or oval in shape with dark green skin. The pulp is red, pink, or yellow, juicy, and very sweet.
